solution_line_template: If there are {num_goldfish} goldfish, and each is playing with {red_balls_per_goldfish} red balls, then the number of red balls in the tank is {num_goldfish}*{red_balls_per_goldfish}=<<{num_goldfish}*{red_balls_per_goldfish}={num_red_balls}>>{num_red_balls}

There are also {num_platyfish} platyfish playing with {white_balls_per_platyfish} white balls, there are {num_platyfish}*{white_balls_per_platyfish}= <<{num_platyfish}*{white_balls_per_platyfish}={num_white_balls}>>{num_white_balls} white balls.
The total number of red and white balls in the fish tank is {num_white_balls}+{num_red_balls} = <<{num_white_balls}+{num_red_balls}={total_balls}>>{total_balls}
